name: Derpy Conga
description:
Derpy Conga is a single-player, physics-based puzzle-platformer that nevertheless feels like a colorful party game. Gather all your friends and help them escape your endangered planet! Take their hand as you find them and form a conga line to be sure not to leave anyone behind but be careful: the longer the line, the harder to control! On the other hand (ahah!), certain obstacles are easier to overcome when you have friends on your side.

Search for Friends

Explore a beautiful alien world and look out for your friends. Once you found them, take them by their hand and never let go again!

Chain based Platforming

Circle your chain of friends around boulders to move them out of the way. Or use a plant to slingshot to unreachable grounds.

Beautiful reactive world

The environment is a live with wondrous plants and creatures reacting on your presence.

Physics based chaos

Then chain of friends is completely physics simulated.
